member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CalibrateRoutes
member.summary: Recalculates route measures using points.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CalibrateRoutes.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The route features to be calibrated. (In, Required)
The field containing values that uniquely identify each route. This field can be numeric or character. (In, Required)
The point features used to calibrate the routes. (In, Required)

The field that identifies the route on which each calibration point is located. The values in this field match those in the route identifier field. This field can be numeric or character. (In, Required)
The field containing the measure value for each calibration point. This field must be numeric. (In, Required)
The feature class to be created. It can be a shapefile or a geodatabase feature class. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CalibrateRoutes.in_route_features
member.summary: The route features to be calibrated. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CalibrateRoutes.route_id_field
member.summary: The field containing values that uniquely identify each route. This field can be numeric or character. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CalibrateRoutes.in_point_features
member.summary: The point features used to calibrate the routes. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CalibrateRoutes.point_id_field
member.summary: The field that identifies the route on which each calibration point is located. The values in this field match those in the route identifier field. This field can be numeric or character. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CalibrateRoutes.measure_field
member.summary: The field containing the measure value for each calibration point. This field must be numeric. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CalibrateRoutes.out_feature_class
member.summary: The feature class to be created. It can be a shapefile or a geodatabase feature class. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CalibrateRoutes.calibrate_method
member.summary: Specifies how route measures will be recalculated. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CalibrateRoutes.search_radius
member.summary: Limits how far a calibration point can be from a route by specifying the distance and its unit of measure. If the units of measure are Unknown, the same units as the coordinate system of the route feature class will be used. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CalibrateRoutes.interpolate_between
member.summary: Specifies whether measure values will be interpolated between the calibration points. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CalibrateRoutes.extrapolate_before
member.summary: Specifies whether measure values will be extrapolated before the calibration points. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CalibrateRoutes.extrapolate_after
member.summary: Specifies whether measure values will be extrapolated after the calibration points. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CalibrateRoutes.ignore_gaps
member.summary: Specifies whether spatial gaps will be ignored when recalculating the measures on disjointed routes. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CalibrateRoutes.keep_all_routes
member.summary: Specifies whether route features that do not have any calibration points will be excluded from the output feature class. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CalibrateRoutes.build_index
member.summary: Specifies whether an attribute index will be created for the route identifier field that is written to the Output Route Feature Class. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CalibrateRoutes.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CalibrateRoutes.ToolboxName
member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CalibrateRoutes.ToolName
member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CalibrateRoutes.Alias
member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CalibrateRoutes.ParameterInfo
member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CreateRoutes
member.summary: Creates routes from existing lines. The input line features that share a common identifier are merged to create a single route.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CreateRoutes.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The features from which routes will be created. (In, Required)
The field containing values that uniquely identify each route. (In, Required)
The feature class to be created. It can be a shapefile or a geodatabase feature class. (Out, Required)
Specifies how route measures will be obtained. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CreateRoutes.in_line_features
member.summary: The features from which routes will be created. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CreateRoutes.route_id_field
member.summary: The field containing values that uniquely identify each route. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CreateRoutes.out_feature_class
member.summary: The feature class to be created. It can be a shapefile or a geodatabase feature class. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CreateRoutes.measure_source
member.summary: Specifies how route measures will be obtained. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CreateRoutes.from_measure_field
member.summary: A field containing measure values. This field must be numeric and is required when the measure source is ONE_FIELD or TWO_FIELDS. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CreateRoutes.to_measure_field
member.summary: A field containing measure values. This field must be numeric and is required when the measure source is TWO_FIELDS. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CreateRoutes.coordinate_priority
member.summary: The position from which measures will be accumulated for each output route. This parameter is ignored when the measure source is TWO_FIELDS. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CreateRoutes.measure_factor
member.summary: A value multiplied by the measure length of each input line before they are merged to create route measures. The default is 1. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CreateRoutes.measure_offset
member.summary: A value added to the route measures after the input lines have been merged to create a route. The default is 0. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CreateRoutes.ignore_gaps
member.summary: Specifies whether spatial gaps will be ignored when calculating the measures on disjointed routes. This parameter is applicable when the measure source is LENGTH or ONE_FIELD. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CreateRoutes.build_index
member.summary: Specifies whether an attribute index will be created for the route identifier field that is written to the output route feature class. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CreateRoutes.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CreateRoutes.ToolboxName
member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CreateRoutes.ToolName
member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CreateRoutes.Alias
member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.CreateRoutes.ParameterInfo
member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.DissolveRouteEvents
member.summary: Removes redundant information from event tables or separates event tables having more than one descriptive attribute into individual tables.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.DissolveRouteEvents.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The table whose rows will be aggregated. (In, Required)
Parameter consisting of the route location fields and the type of events in the input event table. (In, Required)
The field(s)used to aggregate rows. (In, Required)
The table to be created. (Out, Required)
Parameter consisting of the route location fields and the type of events that will be written to the output event table. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.DissolveRouteEvents.in_events
member.summary: The table whose rows will be aggregated. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.DissolveRouteEvents.in_event_properties
member.summary: Parameter consisting of the route location fields and the type of events in the input event table. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.DissolveRouteEvents.dissolve_field
member.summary: The field(s)used to aggregate rows. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.DissolveRouteEvents.out_table
member.summary: The table to be created. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.DissolveRouteEvents.out_event_properties
member.summary: Parameter consisting of the route location fields and the type of events that will be written to the output event table. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.DissolveRouteEvents.dissolve_type
member.summary: Specifies whether the input events will be concatenated or dissolved. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.DissolveRouteEvents.build_index
member.summary: Specifies whether an attribute index will be created for the route identifier field that is written to the output event table. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.DissolveRouteEvents.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.LocateFeaturesAlongRoutes
member.summary: Computes the intersection of input features (point, line, or polygon) and route features and writes the route and measure information to a new event table.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.LocateFeaturesAlongRoutes.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The input point, line, or polygon features. (In, Required)
The routes with which the input features will be intersected. (In, Required)
The field containing values that uniquely identify each route. This field can be numeric or character. (In, Required)
If the input features are points, the search radius is a numeric value defining how far around each point a search will be done to find a target route. (In, Required)
The table to be created. (Out, Required)
Parameter consisting of the route location fields and the type of events that will be written to the output event table. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.LocateFeaturesAlongRoutes.in_features
member.summary: The input point, line, or polygon features. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.LocateFeaturesAlongRoutes.in_routes
member.summary: The routes with which the input features will be intersected. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.LocateFeaturesAlongRoutes.route_id_field
member.summary: The field containing values that uniquely identify each route. This field can be numeric or character. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.LocateFeaturesAlongRoutes.radius_or_tolerance
member.summary: If the input features are points, the search radius is a numeric value defining how far around each point a search will be done to find a target route. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.LocateFeaturesAlongRoutes.out_table
member.summary: The table to be created. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.LocateFeaturesAlongRoutes.out_event_properties
member.summary: Parameter consisting of the route location fields and the type of events that will be written to the output event table. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.LocateFeaturesAlongRoutes.route_locations
member.summary: When locating points along routes, it is possible that more than one route may be within the search radius of any given point. This parameter is ignored when locating lines or polygons along routes. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.LocateFeaturesAlongRoutes.distance_field
member.summary: Specifies whether a field named DISTANCE will be added to the output event table. The values in this field are in the units of the specified search radius. This parameter is ignored when locating lines or polygons along routes. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.LocateFeaturesAlongRoutes.zero_length_events
member.summary: When locating polygons along routes, it is possible that events can be created where the from-measure is equal to the to-measure. This parameter is ignored when locating points or lines along routes. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.LocateFeaturesAlongRoutes.in_fields
member.summary: Specifies whether the output event table will contain route location fields plus all the attributes from the input features. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.LocateFeaturesAlongRoutes.m_direction_offsetting
member.summary: Specifies whether the offset distance calculated should be based on the M direction or the digitized direction. Distances are included in the output event table if the distance_field parameter value DISTANCE is specified. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.LocateFeaturesAlongRoutes.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.LocateFeaturesAlongRoutes.ToolboxName
member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.LocateFeaturesAlongRoutes.ToolName
member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.LocateFeaturesAlongRoutes.Alias
member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.LocateFeaturesAlongRoutes.ParameterInfo
member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.MakeRouteEventLayer
member.summary: Creates a temporary feature layer using routes and route events.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.MakeRouteEventLayer.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The route features upon which events will be located. (In, Required)
The field containing values that uniquely identify each route. (In, Required)
The table whose rows will be located along routes. (In, Required)
Parameter consisting of the route location fields and the type of events in the input event table. (In, Required)
The layer to be created. This layer is stored in memory, so a path is not necessary. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.MakeRouteEventLayer.in_routes
member.summary: The route features upon which events will be located. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.MakeRouteEventLayer.route_id_field
member.summary: The field containing values that uniquely identify each route. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.MakeRouteEventLayer.in_table
member.summary: The table whose rows will be located along routes. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.MakeRouteEventLayer.in_event_properties
member.summary: Parameter consisting of the route location fields and the type of events in the input event table. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.MakeRouteEventLayer.out_layer
member.summary: The layer to be created. This layer is stored in memory, so a path is not necessary. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.MakeRouteEventLayer.offset_field
member.summary: The field containing values used to offset events from their underlying route. This field must be numeric. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.MakeRouteEventLayer.add_error_field
member.summary: Specifies whether a field named LOC_ERROR will be added to the temporary layer that is created. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.MakeRouteEventLayer.add_angle_field
member.summary: Specifies whether a field named LOC_ANGLE will be added to the temporary layer that is created. This parameter is only valid when the event type is POINT. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.MakeRouteEventLayer.angle_type
member.summary: Specifies the type of locating angle that will be calculated. This parameter is only valid if ANGLE_FIELD has been specified. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.MakeRouteEventLayer.complement_angle
member.summary: Specifies whether the complement of the locating angle will be calculated. This parameter is only valid if ANGLE_FIELD has been specified. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.MakeRouteEventLayer.offset_direction
member.summary: Specifies the side on which the route events with a positive offset are displayed. This parameter is only valid if an offset field has been specified. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.MakeRouteEventLayer.point_event_type
member.summary: Specifies whether point events will be treated as point features or multipoint features. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.MakeRouteEventLayer.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.MakeRouteEventLayer.ToolboxName
member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.MakeRouteEventLayer.ToolName
member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.MakeRouteEventLayer.Alias
member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.MakeRouteEventLayer.ParameterInfo
member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.OverlayRouteEvents
member.summary: Overlays two event tables to create an output event table that represents the union or intersection of the input.

member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The input event table. (In, Required)
Parameter consisting of the route location fields and the type of events in the input event table. (In, Required)
The overlay event table. (In, Required)
Parameter consisting of the route location fields and the type of events in the overlay event table. (In, Required)
The type of overlay to be performed. (In, Required)
The table to be created. (Out, Required)
Parameter consisting of the route location fields and the type of events that will be written to the output event table. (Out, Required)

member.summary: The input event table. (In, Required)

member.summary: Parameter consisting of the route location fields and the type of events in the input event table. (In, Required)

member.summary: Parameter consisting of the route location fields and the type of events in the overlay event table. (In, Required)

member.summary: The type of overlay to be performed. (In, Required)

member.summary: The table to be created. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.OverlayRouteEvents.out_event_properties
member.summary: Parameter consisting of the route location fields and the type of events that will be written to the output event table. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.OverlayRouteEvents.zero_length_events
member.summary: Specifies whether to keep zero length line events in the output table. This parameter is only valid when the output event type is LINE. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.OverlayRouteEvents.in_fields
member.summary: Specifies whether all the fields from the input and overlay event tables will be written to the output event table. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.OverlayRouteEvents.build_index
member.summary: Specifies whether an attribute index will be created for the route identifier field that is written to the output event table. (In, Optional)

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.TransformRouteEvents
member.summary: This tool transforms the measures of events from one route reference to another and writes them to a new event table.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.TransformRouteEvents.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The input event table. (In, Required)
Parameter consisting of the route location fields and the type of events in the input event table. (In, Required)
The input route features. (In, Required)
The field containing values that uniquely identify each input route. (In, Required)
The route features to which the input events will be transformed. (In, Required)
The field containing values that uniquely identify each target route. (In, Required)
The table to be created. (Out, Required)
Parameter consisting of the route location fields and the type of events that will be written to the output event table. (Out, Required)
The maximum tolerated distance between the input events and the target routes. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.TransformRouteEvents.in_table
member.summary: The input event table. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.TransformRouteEvents.in_event_properties
member.summary: Parameter consisting of the route location fields and the type of events in the input event table. (In, Required)

member.summary: The input route features. (In, Required)

member.summary: The field containing values that uniquely identify each input route. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.TransformRouteEvents.target_routes
member.summary: The route features to which the input events will be transformed. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.TransformRouteEvents.target_route_id_field
member.summary: The field containing values that uniquely identify each target route. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.TransformRouteEvents.out_table
member.summary: The table to be created. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.TransformRouteEvents.out_event_properties
member.summary: Parameter consisting of the route location fields and the type of events that will be written to the output event table. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.TransformRouteEvents.cluster_tolerance
member.summary: The maximum tolerated distance between the input events and the target routes. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.LinearReferencingTools.TransformRouteEvents.in_fields
member.summary: Specifies whether the output event table will contain route location fields plus all the attributes from the input events. (In, Optional)

member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.
